title.narrative: WASH-COMMUNITY CAPACITY

description.narrative: By 2021, communities in target areas are able and willing to use quality Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services., which contributes to Hygiene, Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres, Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, disadvantaged children, adolescents, and women utilise quality health, nutrition, water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) services.
